resources.string: Are you sure you want to quit?
Help Santa Claus escape the tower! Save this Christmas by collecting all the gifts while finding your way out. Good luck!
Swipe and hold anywhere to set Santa\'s moving direction. That\'s it!
"Thank you for trying our game! Feel free to contact us at support@spatialia.com to provide some feedback, give us suggestions for new features, or to just say hello!"
